title: Rolling - large and small bicycle wheel

content.question: A bicycle has a large front wheel of radius <math alttext="R sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>F</mtext></msub></math> and a smaller back wheel of radius <math alttext="R sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>, as shown. What is the angular displacement of the back wheel during this time interval?
